name: Planets (CrazySheep05)
description:
This is a game about exploring a small solar system in a space ship.

All the planets are generated using Surface Nets, meaning they may be terraformed in the future, although this option is not implemented yet.

There are still some glitches, such as getting stuck in a planet. If this happens, try leaving the planet in the direction oppesite to where it is orbiting.
